movie_desc: Siddharth Abimanyu, an influential scientist, is involved in various illegal medical practices. Mithran, an efficient IPS officer, decides to expose him.
Writers: A.N. Balakrishnan, Mohan Raja (as M. Raja)

movie_desc: A law student from a lower caste begins a friendship with his classmate, a girl who belongs to a higher caste, and the men in her family start giving him trouble over this.

A common man's struggles against a corrupt police force put him on the wrong side of the law. He becomes a don, who is loved and respected by many, but his growing power and influence exact a heavy toll.
Stars: Kamal Haasan, Saranya Ponvannan, Delhi Ganesh
